mainText: Raising multiple kids is an exponential challenge.  If one child takes X amount of work, two kids is about double that.  Three kids is actually 4 times more difficult, and raising four kids is 8 time more difficult.  Any more than that is nearly impossible.
You should learn to let things go, like water under the bridge.  If you do, you will be able to put out the fires when people try to burn bridges in your life.
